title: Date-night Best Bets: North Brevard Oct. 23-25
text:

Here are our best suggestions for date night in north Brevard. Post to Facebook Date-night Best Bets: North Brevard Oct. 23-25 Looking for things to do and places to go with that special someone? Check out this story on floridatoday.com: http://on.flatoday.com/1LIxcox Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation Luann Manderville, FLORIDA TODAY 11:56 a.m. EDT October 20, 2015 20 SEPTEMBER 2008, COCOA, FL - Grandpa's Steak House offers reasonably priced meals with big steaks and an even bigger salad bar. This is a New York Strip with Prime Rib in the background. Photo by Chris Kridler, FLORIDA TODAY. (Photo: Chris Kridler, FLORIDA TODAY) CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Food 
How about a hand-cut steak this weekend? Head to Grandpa’s Steakhouse at 3660 King St. in Cocoa. The restaurant is open from 11 a.m. to 9 p.m Tuesday-Saturday. Call 321-638-4379. 
Movie 
“Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension” (R): Using a special camera that can see spirits, a family must protect their daughter from an evil entity with a sinister plan. Showing in local theaters. 
Entertainment 
If you and your other half are fans of the 1975 musical comedy horror film “The Rocky Horror Picture Show”, then head to see a live stage performance This weekend. “The Rocky Horror Picture Show” at Emma Parrish Theatre at the Titusville playhouse begin 8 p.m. Friday and Saturday and 2 p.m. Sunday at 301 Julia St. Additional performances at 8 p.m. and 11:59 p.m. Oct. 30; 8 p.m. and 11:59 p.m. Oct. 31. Tickets are $22-$26. Call 321-268-1125 or visit titusvilleplayhouse.com. 
Send me your date night suggests @lumanderville or tgif@floriatoday.com . Read or Share this story: http://on.flatoday.com/1LIxcox TOP VIDEOS
